name: Genjiro: Samurai Defense
description:
A Samurai Hack & Slash, Roguelike, City Defense Game!
Upgrade your skills and defend the city from waves of incoming enemies.

For how long can you hold them off?

Each character has 3 Skills + Dodge (L-Shift, Space) and Block (Right click, Reduces incoming damage by 60%)

Playable characters : Samurai , Onna-musha

Ninja and Monk characters will be released in future updates.



*please report any bug you found in the game to the email in "Credit" Tab in main menu*
